channel.title: Adding music to a client? How would i go about this
channel.description:
it can be as in when its loading up like mopar or so its in the music tab
thanks

item.title: Adding music to a client? How would i go about this
item.dc:creator: @i_own_pking i_own_pking
item.description:
@i_own_pking wrote:

[quote=“Haxor X, post:2, topic:117387”]why not just change all of mopars files into .java files then just look around and see…
thats the only idea i can think of…[/quote]

  1. i dont want to use mopar’s source as its out of order to moparisthebest
  2. i dont want that source anyway
  3. that would take me ages and i know people have music on clients

Read full topic
